mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRY_NUMBER, PEOPLE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, SECRET_STATUS, INQUIRY_PASSWORD, INQUIRY_REGISTER_DATE, INQUIRY_MODIFY_DATE, RESPONSE_STATUS) VALUES ( (), #{peopleId}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{secretStatus}, #{inquiryPassword}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NUMBER FROM (SELECT INQUIRY_NUMBER, ROWNUM FROM INQUIRY ORDER BY INQUIRY_NUMBER DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT INQUIRY_NUMBER, PEOPLE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, SECRET_STATUS, INQUIRY_REGISTER_DATE, INQUIRY_MODIFY_DATE, RESPONSE_STATUS FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_NUMBER, PEOPLE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, SECRET_STATUS, INQUIRY_REGISTER_DATE, INQUIRY_MODIFY_DATE, RESPONSE_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, INQUIRY_NUMBER, PEOPLE_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, SECRET_STATUS, INQUIRY_REGISTER_DATE, INQUIRY_MODIFY_DATE, RESPONSE_STATUS FROM ( SELECT * FROM INQUIRY ORDER BY INQUIRY_NUMBER DESC ) ) WHERE INQUIRY_NUMBER <= #{lastInquiryNumber} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM INQUIRY
